item.title: Getting Started
item.description: What do you do when you have a homework assignment that you don’t know how to approach? A surefire way to start is to look at the problem requirements and do some research. Think about some questions that can point you in the right direction. Have you solved something similar to this in the past? How many steps are needed to solve a problem like this? Are there resources I can use to learn this information?
